doc:
John Beasley (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Beasley_(actor) 0 John Beasley (born June 26, 1943) is an American actor known for his role as Irv Harper on the TV series Everwood and recurring roles on CSI, Millennium and The Pretender. John_Beasley ( born June_26_,_1943 ) is an_American_actor known for his_role as Irv_Harper on the_TV_series_Everwood and recurring roles on CSI , Millennium and The_Pretender .
